name: Poppy Creepy PlayHouse
description:
Poppy was living near to haunted house and heard many scary stories about this house, doll but always wish to see by-self. One day he broke poppy house and enter into building!

Suddenly scary voices came and doors starting to close one by one. HELP man to escape from this haunted house.

ALERT!!!!

Scary doll is walking in haunted house, Don't make noises and don't go in front of evil doll otherwise he'll after you.

You're task is to find KEY and unlock door which is located in ground floor.

HELP Poor man to survive.

BEST OF LUCK
